headline: Seagate Technology (STX) Q1 2026 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: Dave Mosley: Thanks, Shanye, and hello, everyone.  Seagate Technology Holdings plc delivered a very strong start to fiscal 2026.  Non-GAAP gross margin set a new company record at 40.1%, and non-GAAP operating margin climbed to 29%, a level last seen in fiscal 2012.

headline: Seagate (STX) Q1 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates
summary: Seagate (STX) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +10.59% and +3.93%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Seagate (STX) Q1 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates
raw.summary: Seagate (STX) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +10.59% and +3.93%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Seagate Technology (NASDAQ:STX) Reports Strong Q3, Stock Soars
summary: Data storage manufacturer Seagate (NASDAQ:STX) reported Q3 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 21.3% year on year to $2.63 billion. Guidance for next quarter’s revenue was better than expected at $2.7 billion at the midpoint, 1.8% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.61 per share was 8.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Seagate Posts Results Ahead Of Estimates Amid AI-Fueled 160% Rally
summary: Seagate Technology stock pushed higher Tuesday after the company reported fiscal first-quarter earnings above estimates. Shares of the hard-disk drive maker have soared more than 160% this year, as investors bet on AI and a booming data-center market to drive demand for computer hardware.

raw.headline: Seagate Posts Results Ahead Of Estimates Amid AI-Fueled 160% Rally

Shares of the hard-disk drive maker have soared more than 160% this year, as investors bet on AI and a booming data-center market to drive demand for computer hardware.

headline: Seagate: Fiscal Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results exceeded Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of four analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $2.36 per share. The electronic storage maker posted revenue of $2.63 billion in the period, also surpassing Street forecasts.

headline: Seagate forecasts second-quarter results above estimates on AI strength
summary: Cloud providers are pouring hundreds of billions of dollars into hardware that aids in the data-intensive process of training and running GenAI applications.  Seagate, which supplies disk drives used to store vast amounts of data, has benefited from this.

headline: Seagate Technology Reports Fiscal First Quarter 2026 Financial Results
summary: SINGAPORE, October 28, 2025--Seagate Technology Holdings plc (NASDAQ: STX) (the "Company" or "Seagate"), a leading innovator of mass-capacity data storage, today reported financial results for its fiscal first quarter ended October 3, 2025.

summary: WDC's AI-fueled demand, margin gains and revenue expansion set the stage for another strong quarterly performance.
